name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Solutions Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, particularly in the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **Python** for backend development and **GIS** for geographical data analysis, I excel in building AI-driven solutions that enhance predictive analytics capabilities. My technical expertise extends to implementing effective data analysis strategies that improve customer engagement and meet project management goals.

Skilled in employing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, **Django**, and a robust understanding of **cloud services** such as **AWS** and **Azure**. I also have hands-on experience with **microservices**, **event-driven architectures**, and **CI/CD pipelines**, ensuring scalable and reliable software deployment.

Additionally, I leverage strong problem-solving skills and foster collaboration through effective communication, ensuring compliance with industry standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS while delivering innovative solutions.
